MemoryInfobox.description: 'The Pythia (431 BCE)|Oracle, after fleeing the the Cult of Kosmos, was recognized by a neighbor and blackmailed. The Oracle's cousin wanted the blackmailer dealt with.'

General_Description: '''There Goes the Neighborhood''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra met the cousin of the [[Pythia (431 BCE)|Pythia]], whom she had confronted earlier at the [[Chora of Delphi]].
Section_Dialogue:
While traveling across [[Greece]], Kassandra saw a contract from a philosopher on a [[message board]]. : '''Note:''
'''''Dear [[Eagle]] Bearer, may you read this message! Come see me. I owe you thanks.'' Kassandra accepted the contact and left to find the philosopher, who was pacing outside his house. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I got your message on the board. What's going on?'' *'''Man:''' ''I know who you are, and I wanted to thank you, Eagle Bearer.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''For what?'' *'''Man:''' ''You remember the oracle you talked to at [[Delphi]]? She's my cousin. You helped her realize the error of her ways, and she ran away from the [[Cult of Kosmos|Cult]]. She told me everything.'' |-|I'm glad the oracle is alive.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I wasn't sure what happened to her when I left Delphi. I'm glad to knows she's all right.'' *'''Man:''' ''As am I. But the Cult of Kosmos is searching everywhere for her. I need your help.'' |-|The oracle is a bad person.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''The oracle was working for some horrible people. She should be ashamed of what she did for them.'' *'''Man:''' ''She is! She's trying to make up for what she did. Please though, they're searching for her everywhere, and we need to get the Cult of Kosmos off her scent.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''What do you have in mind?'' *'''Man:''' ''My neighbor recognized her and is blackmailing us, saying if I don't give him all my earnings, he'll claim the reward on her head. But with my neighbor gone, our troubles would be over.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Let me guess. You want me to kill him.'' *'''Man:''' ''His death is the only solution.'' (Accept – "I'll handle it.") [[File:ACOD-ThereGoesTheNeighborhood-04.jpg|thumb|250px|Kassandra aiming her bow at the archer.]] *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll handle this.'' *'''Man:''' ''You'll be just what I need.'' *'''Kassandra:''' Chaire. Kassandra tracked down the man, an [[archer]] employed by the local garrison, and killed him. *'''Kasssandra:''' ''Time to get my reward.'' Kassandra returned to the Pythia's cousin. *'''Man:''' ''You again. Have you killed him?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Your man is dead.'' *'''Man:''' ''Nicely done, my friend. Please take this as thanks.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Thank you.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and assassinated the blackmailer.
Section_Trivia: *The location and character model for the quest giver is randomized.
